page.title: Pricing – Cenety
page.heroTitle: One QR code that always stays.
page.heroDescription: Quotes & invoices in minutes. Dynamic QR codes for your business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions. For further questions, please contact us.

q1.question: What is a dynamic QR code?
q1.answer: A dynamic QR code is a QR code whose target URL you can change at any time without having to reprint the code itself. The QR code remains the same, but the destination address can be updated.

q2.question: Can I change the link later?
q2.answer: Yes, absolutely! With dynamic QR codes, you can change the target URL at any time without regenerating or reprinting the QR code. Once printed, the code remains valid while you can flexibly adjust the destination.

q3.question: How does invoice creation work?
q3.answer: You can create quotes and later convert them directly into invoices. All data is automatically transferred. Documents can be exported as PDF and sent by email.

q4.question: What happens when I reach my limit?
q4.answer: When you reach your limit, you can either upgrade to a higher plan or wait until the counter resets next month. For documents, the counter resets monthly.

q5.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade at any time?
q5.answer: Yes, you can switch between plans at any time. When upgrading, additional features are unlocked immediately. When downgrading, your data remains, but some features will be restricted.

Terms.metaDescription: Terms and conditions for using Cenety services
Terms.title: Terms of Service

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.description: Terms and conditions for using Cenety SaaS services

section1.title: 1. Scope and Subject Matter
section1.description: These Terms of Service (ToS) apply to the use of the Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform Cenety, operated by [Your Company Name].
section1.description2: Cenety provides a cloud-based platform for managing customers, creating quotes and invoices, and generating and managing QR codes.
section1.importantText: Conflicting or deviating conditions of the user will not become part of the contract unless we expressly agree to their validity in writing.

subsection1.title: 2.1 Registration
subsection1.text: The use of Cenety requires registration. By registering, the user makes a binding offer to conclude a usage contract.

subsection2.title: 2.2 Contract Acceptance
subsection2.text: The contract is concluded by confirming the registration via email. There is no right to conclude a contract.

subsection3.title: 2.3 Age of Majority
subsection3.text: Registration is only permitted for fully legally competent natural persons and legal entities. Minors may only register with the consent of their legal guardians.

section3.title: 3. Scope of Services
section3.description: The specific scope of services depends on the selected price tier (Free, Starter, Pro):
section3.note: We reserve the right to change or expand the scope of services at any time. Significant restrictions will be communicated to existing users in a timely manner.

subsection1.title: 4.1 Prices
subsection1.text: Current prices can be viewed on our
subsection1.text2: . All prices are plus applicable VAT.

subsection2.title: 4.2 Payment Method
subsection2.text: Payment is made in advance by credit card or SEPA direct debit via our payment service provider Stripe, depending on the selected billing interval (monthly or annually).

subsection3.title: 4.3 Payment Default
subsection3.text: In case of payment default, we are entitled to block access to the platform. Default interest is calculated at 9 percentage points above the base rate (for consumers) or 9 percentage points above the base rate (for entrepreneurs).

subsection4.title: 4.4 Price Changes
subsection4.text: Price changes for existing customers will be announced by email at least 6 weeks before they take effect. If the user does not object within 4 weeks, the new prices are considered accepted.

section5.title: 5. Right of Withdrawal for Consumers
section5.subtitle: Withdrawal Instructions
section5.rightText: You have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.
section5.period: The withdrawal period is fourteen days from the day of contract conclusion.
section5.howTo: To exercise your right of withdrawal, you must inform us by means of a clear statement (e.g., by email to support@cenety.com) of your decision to withdraw from this contract.
section5.consequencesText: If you withdraw from this contract, we must reimburse you for all payments we have received from you immediately and no later than fourteen days.
section5.earlyExpiry: Early expiry of the right of withdrawal:
section5.earlyExpiryText: The right of withdrawal expires prematurely if we have only begun to execute the contract after you have given your express consent and at the same time confirmed your knowledge that you will lose your right of withdrawal upon complete fulfillment of the contract.

subsection1.title: 6.1 Contract Duration
subsection1.text: The contract is concluded for the selected term (monthly or annually) and automatically renews for the same term unless terminated.

subsection2.title: 6.2 Ordinary Termination
subsection2.text: Either party may terminate the contract with 30 days' notice at the end of the respective term. Termination must be in text form (email is sufficient) to support@cenety.com.

subsection3.title: 6.3 Extraordinary Termination
subsection3.text: The right to extraordinary termination for important reasons remains unaffected. An important reason exists in particular in the case of:
subsection3.item1: Violation of these ToS despite warning
subsection3.item2: Payment default of more than 30 days
subsection3.item3: Misuse of the platform for illegal purposes

subsection4.title: 6.4 Data Export
subsection4.text: After the end of the contract, the user has a period of 30 days to export their data. After that, all data will be irrevocably deleted.

subsection1.title: 7.1 Account Security
subsection1.text: The user is obliged to keep their access data secret and protect them from access by third parties. In case of suspicion of misuse, the user is obliged to inform us immediately.

subsection2.title: 7.2 Data Accuracy
subsection2.text: The user is responsible for the accuracy and legality of the data entered by them, especially in invoices and documents.

subsection3.title: 7.3 Prohibited Use
subsection3.text: The user undertakes not to use the platform for the following purposes:
subsection3.item3: Distribution of malware or harmful software
subsection3.item4: Violation of third-party rights (copyright, trademark rights, etc.)
subsection3.item5: Reverse engineering or decompilation of the software

section8.title: 8. Availability and Maintenance
section8.description: We strive to ensure platform availability of 99% on an annual average. Excluded are:
section8.item2: Emergency maintenance to fix critical security vulnerabilities
section8.item4: DDoS attacks and other cyber attacks

section9.title: 9. Data Protection
section9.description: The protection of your personal data is important to us. Details on data processing can be found in our
section9.note: The user is themselves responsible under the GDPR for the customer data stored by them in Cenety and undertakes to comply with data protection regulations.

subsection1.title: 10.1 Limitation of Liability
subsection1.text: We are liable without limitation for damages resulting from injury to life, body or health as well as for intent and gross negligence.
subsection1.text2: In case of slight negligence, we are only liable for breach of essential contractual obligations (cardinal obligations). Liability in this case is limited to the contract-typical, foreseeable damage.

subsection2.title: 10.2 Data Loss
subsection2.text: We perform daily automatic backups. Nevertheless, we recommend that the user regularly perform their own backups of their data. Liability for data loss only exists if the user has ensured through regular data backup that data can be restored with reasonable effort.

subsection3.title: 10.3 Warranty
subsection3.text: We warrant that the software essentially fulfills the agreed functions. Insignificant defects do not justify warranty claims.

section11.title: 11. Intellectual Property
section11.description: All rights to the platform, including the source code, design and documentation, belong to us. The user is only granted a non-exclusive, non-transferable right of use.
section11.note: The user retains all rights to the content created by them (customer data, documents, etc.).

section12.title: 12. Changes to the ToS
section12.description: We reserve the right to change these ToS with 6 weeks' notice. Changes will be communicated to the user by email.
section12.description2: If the user does not object within 4 weeks of receipt of the change notice, the changed ToS are considered accepted. In case of objection, the user may terminate the contract extraordinarily at the time the changes take effect.

subsection1.title: 13.1 Applicable Law
subsection1.text: The law of the Federal Republic of Germany exclusively applies, excluding the UN Sales Law.

subsection2.title: 13.2 Place of Jurisdiction
subsection2.text: If the user is a merchant, legal entity under public law or public-law special fund, the exclusive place of jurisdiction for all disputes arising from this contract is our business location.

subsection3.title: 13.3 Severability Clause
subsection3.text: Should individual provisions of these ToS be or become invalid, the validity of the remaining provisions remains unaffected.

Terms.legalNotice: Legal Notice: This ToS template should be reviewed by a specialist lawyer for IT law and adapted to your specific business conditions. Replace all placeholders in square brackets with your actual company data.

Privacy.metaDescription: GDPR compliant privacy policy for Cenety services
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: GDPR compliant privacy policy for Cenety

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.description: Manage your data and privacy settings

section1.title: 1. Name and Contact Details of the Controller
1. Information Collection
section1.content: We collect information to provide better services to all our users. The information we collect includes basic account information such as your name and email address, as well as usage data related to your interactions with our services.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, protect, and improve our services, to develop new ones, and to protect Cenety and our users. We also use this information to offer you tailored content and to improve your overall experience.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content: We do not share personal information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Cenety except in the following cases: with your consent, for external processing, for legal reasons, or in case of a merger or acquisition.

section4.title: 4. Your Rights
section4.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your data. You may also have the right to receive a copy of your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

lastUpdated.title: Last Updated
lastUpdated.content: This Privacy Policy was last updated on June 1, 2023.

dispute.title: EU Dispute Resolution
dispute.euPlatform: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):
dispute.participation: We are not willing or obligated to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

liability.title: Liability for Content and Links
liability.contentText: As a service provider, we are liable for own contents of these websites according to Sec. 7, paragraph 1 German Telemedia Act (TMG). However, according to Sec. 8 to 10 German Telemedia Act (TMG), service providers are not obligated to permanently monitor submitted or stored information or to search for evidences that indicate illegal activities.
liability.linksText: Our offer includes links to external third party websites. We have no influence on the contents of those websites, therefore we cannot guarantee for those contents. Providers or administrators of linked websites are always responsible for their own contents.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.text: The content and works published on this website underlie the German copyright law. Any kind of duplication, processing, distribution or any kind of utilization beyond the scope of copyright law shall require the prior written consent of the author or originator in question.

offering3.feature3: Tracking and analytics for each QR code (Pro)

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Get started with your optimized business in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Sign up for free and create your account in less than a minute. No credit card required.

step2.title: Add Customers
step2.description: Start entering your customers. Import existing data or add new customers manually.

step3.title: Create Documents
step3.description: Create your first quote or invoice. Use our templates or customize everything to your needs.

step4.title: Optimize Business
step4.description: Use analytics and reporting to optimize and grow your business. Track all important metrics.

benefit1.title: Time Saving
benefit1.description: Automate recurring tasks and save hours per week

benefit2.title: Professional
benefit2.description: Create professional documents that reflect your brand

benefit3.title: Centralized
benefit3.description: Everything in one place – no need for multiple tools

benefit4.title: GDPR Compliant
benefit4.description: Your data is secure and meets the highest privacy standards

benefit5.title: Scalable
benefit5.description: Grows with your business – from individuals to teams

benefit6.title: Support
benefit6.description: Our team is always available to help you

q1.question: How does customer management work?
q1.answer: Our customer management allows you to store all contact information, addresses, notes, and interaction history of your customers in one central location. You can quickly search, filter, and see all important information at a glance.

q2.question: Can I convert quotes to invoices?
q2.answer: Yes, absolutely! With a single click, you can convert any quote into an invoice. All data is automatically transferred, and you only need to adjust the invoice number.

q3.question: How do dynamic QR codes work?
q3.answer: Dynamic QR codes have a permanent link, but the destination can be changed at any time. This means you don't need to reprint the QR code if the target URL changes. Perfect for marketing materials that are used for longer periods.

q4.question: Is my data secure?
q4.answer: Absolutely! We use state-of-the-art encryption technologies and are fully GDPR compliant. Your data is stored securely and never shared with third parties.

q5.question: Is there a free trial?
q5.answer: Yes, you can try Cenety free for 14 days. No credit card required. After the trial period, you can choose from various plans that fit your business.

q6.question: Can I export my data?
q6.answer: Yes, you can export all your data at any time. We offer export functions for customers, documents, and all other data in various formats (CSV, PDF, JSON).

dataExport.intro: You have the right to receive a copy of all your personal data. The export includes:

includes.profile: Your user profile and account information

dataExport.noteText: The export is created immediately and contains all current data. The files are not stored on our servers.

toast.exportSuccessJSON: Your data has been downloaded as a JSON file.
toast.exportSuccessCSV: Your data has been downloaded as CSV files.
toast.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

accountDeletion.title: Delete Account
accountDeletion.description: Delete your account and all associated data (GDPR Art. 17 - Right to be forgotten)

points.dataLost: All your data will be permanently deleted
points.contentLost: Customers, documents, QR codes and scan statistics will be lost
points.exception: Exception: Paid invoices must be kept for 10 years for legal reasons. In this case, your account will be anonymized instead of deleted.

points.accountDeactivated: Your user account will be immediately deactivated
points.dataDeleted: All personal data will be deleted
points.loggedOut: You will be automatically logged out
points.auditLog: An audit log entry will be created for compliance purposes

confirm.title: Really delete account?
confirm.description: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
confirm.note: Note: If you have paid invoices that are less than 10 years old, your account will be anonymized instead of deleted (legal retention requirement).

toast.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

Support.title: Support – Cenety
Support.description: Get help and support for your Cenety account.
Support.heading: Support
Support.text: Get help and support for your Cenety account.
Support.contactDescription: Fill out the form below to get in touch with our support team.

ticket.viewAndRespond: View and respond to your support ticket.
ticket.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation below.
ticket.ticketClosed: This ticket is closed and cannot receive new messages.
ticket.noMessagesAdmin: No messages in this ticket yet.

supportChannels.title: Support Channels
supportChannels.description: Choose the most convenient way to reach our support team.

chat.title: Live Chat
chat.availability: Available from 9 AM to 5 PM CET

phone.title: Phone Support
phone.restriction: Only for Premium and Enterprise packages

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Quick answers to commonly asked questions

upgrade.question: How can I upgrade my plan?
upgrade.answer: You can upgrade your plan in the Billing section of your dashboard.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time in your account settings.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: You can reset your password by clicking "Forgot password?" on the login page.

updateProfile.question: How do I update my profile?
updateProfile.answer: You can update your profile information in the Settings section.

included.question: What features are included in my plan?
included.answer: You can see all features included in your plan on the pricing page.

api.question: How do I use the API?
api.answer: You can find the API documentation in our developer documentation section.

Support.noMessagesAdmin: No messages in this ticket yet.

createTicket.title: Create Support Ticket - Get Expert Help | Professional Support
createTicket.description: Submit a support ticket and get help from our expert team. Fast response times, detailed tracking, and priority support for your business needs. Available 24/7.

footer.allPrices: All prices are in Euro. Our General Terms and Conditions apply.
footer.electronic: This document was created electronically and is valid without signature.

Scheduling.description: Manage your event types, availability, and bookings

dashboard.alreadyLive: All Event Types are already active
dashboard.alreadyPaused: All Event Types are already paused
dashboard.quickActionsDescription: Manage your event types quickly and easily
dashboard.eventTypesDescription: Activate or deactivate event types with one click

eventTypes.title: Event Types
eventTypes.createDescription: Create a new event type for scheduling

form.basicInfoDescription: Set up the basic details for your event type
form.title: Title
form.titleDescription: A descriptive name for this event type
form.slugDescription: Used in the booking URL. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Optional description for this event type
form.durationDescription: Configure the duration and buffer times
form.locationDescription: Where will this event take place?
form.locationValueDescription: Optional: Meeting link, address, or phone number
form.availabilityDescription: Configure when bookings can be made
form.minimumNoticeDescription: How many hours in advance must bookings be made?
form.bookingWindowDescription: How far in advance can bookings be made?
form.isActiveDescription: Inactive event types won't appear on booking pages
form.pricingDescription: Set a price per person for this event type (optional)
form.priceDescription: Price per person (will be multiplied by number of participants)
form.embedDescription: Embed this event type on your website - no iframe issues
form.scriptWidgetPreview: The JavaScript widget will render a button that opens a modal with the booking page when clicked.
form.embedInstructions: Copy this code and paste it into your website's HTML
form.createSuccessDescription: Your event type has been created successfully
form.updateSuccessDescription: Your event type has been updated successfully

detail.title: Event Type Details

actions.duplicatedDescription: The event type has been duplicated successfully

actions.rescheduleDescription: Select a new date and time for this booking. The old slot will be freed up.

actions.reactivateConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to reactivate this canceled booking? The slot must still be available.

activeSessions.title: Active Sessions
activeSessions.revokedDescription: The session has been successfully ended
activeSessions.allRevokedDescription: All other sessions have been ended
activeSessions.allClearedDescription: You will now be logged out. Please log in again to test the 2FA system.
activeSessions.revokeAllConfirmDescription: This will end all other active sessions except the current one. You will need to log in again on those devices.
activeSessions.clearAllConfirmDescription: This will delete ALL sessions including the current one. You will be logged out and must log in again. This is useful for testing the 2FA system.
activeSessions.revokeConfirmDescription: This session will be ended and the user must log in again.

loginHistory.title: Login History
loginHistory.description: Overview of your recent login attempts

About.metaDescription: Learn more about Cenety, our mission, vision and values

hero.title: About Cenety
hero.description: Founded in 2023, Cenety is a company dedicated to helping businesses and developers create exceptional SaaS applications with modern technologies.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're on a mission to simplify the development process and empower creators to build exceptional software applications without getting bogged down in repetitive tasks and configurations.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where building robust SaaS applications is accessible to all developers, regardless of their experience level or resources. By providing high-quality starter kits and templates, we aim to democratize SaaS development and help businesses launch faster.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We believe in creating high-quality, well-documented code that stands the test of time.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new technologies and continuously improve our products.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make development more accessible by providing clear documentation and intuitive interfaces.

community.title: Community
community.description: We value the developer community and actively contribute to open-source projects.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team consists of passionate developers, designers, and product managers who are dedicated to creating exceptional developer experiences.
team.locationDescription: We're located around the world and embrace remote work and diverse perspectives.

Security.metaDescription: How we keep your data secure at Cenety

hero.title: Security at Cenety
hero.description: Your security and privacy are our top priorities

Security.intro: At Cenety, we understand that the security of your data is critical. We've built our platform with security in mind at every step, implementing industry best practices and continuously monitoring for threats.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Security
infrastructure.item1: All data is encrypted at rest and in transit using industry-standard encryption
infrastructure.item2: Hosted on secure cloud infrastructure with multiple redundancy layers
infrastructure.item3: Regular security audits and penetration testing by third-party specialists

account.title: Account Security
account.item1: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) to protect your account
account.item2: Role-based access controls for team management
account.item3: Session management with automatic timeouts for inactive sessions

reporting.title: Reporting Security Issues
reporting.text: If you discover a potential security vulnerability, please report it responsibly by emailing our security team at security@cenety.com.
reporting.text2: Our security team will acknowledge your report within 24 hours and work with you to understand and address the issue quickly.

compliance.title: Compliance and Certifications
compliance.description: Cenety is committed to meeting industry standards and regulatory requirements to ensure your data is protected:

Customization.metaDescription: Customize Cenety to fit your unique needs

hero.title: Customization
hero.description: Tailor Cenety to match your brand and workflow

Customization.intro: Cenety is designed to be highly customizable, allowing you to adapt the platform to your specific requirements without compromise. From visual elements to core functionality, our flexible architecture gives you the freedom to create a truly personalized experience.

visual.title: Visual Customization
visual.intro: Customize the look and feel of your Cenety implementation to match your brand identity:

functional.title: Functional Customization
functional.intro: Tailor the functionality to meet your specific business requirements:

developer.title: Developer Extensibility
developer.intro: Extend Cenety with custom code and integrations:

integration.title: Integration Capabilities
integration.intro: Seamlessly connect Cenety with your existing tools and services:

cta.title: Need help with customization?
cta.description: Our team of experts can assist you with advanced customization needs or provide guidance on best practices for extending Cenety.

Changelog.metaDescription: The latest updates and improvements to Cenety

hero.title: Changelog
hero.description: The latest updates and improvements to Cenety

v2.title: Major Release - Version 2.0
v2.description: A complete rebuild with Next.js 15, improved UI, and enhanced features

changes.feature1: Upgraded to Next.js 15 with improved performance
changes.feature2: Added Supabase integration for more flexible database operations
changes.feature3: Implemented Next-Intl for better internationalization support
changes.feature4: Implemented Supabase-based blog system for content management
changes.improvement1: Redesigned dashboard with better user experience
changes.improvement2: Enhanced Stripe integration with more payment options
changes.fix1: Fixed authentication issues with email providers
changes.fix2: Resolved styling inconsistencies across different browsers

v1_5.title: Feature Update
v1_5.description: New features and improvements to enhance user experience

v1_4.title: Dashboard Enhancements
v1_4.description: Improvements to the dashboard UI and functionality
